CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 17, 1959, pg. 15 reads: "Waiting For The Glendy Burk" - "This was the title of the dance performed by the Letsche School Dance Group at Stephen Foster Festival, Jan. 9. Members of the group are Dorothy Burton, Joyce Ann Campbell, Loretta Clancy, Claudette Cox, Roberta Crosby, Charlene Jackson, Hattie Nettles and Darling Turner.  The leader of the group is Miss Theresa Weaver. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of the members of the Letsche School Dance Group, left to right: Dorothy Burton, Joyce Ann Campbell, Loretta Clancy, Claudette Cox, Roberta Crosby, Charlene Jackson, Hattie Nettles, and Darling Turner, performing  "Waiting For The Glendy Burk" in front of backdrop with sea and cityscape at the Stephen Foster Festival
